author: deborah
title: NFTs to own one's own data and IP
description: Current data companies make products out of the personal and IP data of their customers and employees without proportionate compensation.
solution: NFTs to track data use permissions in particular products so that ones data is only leased and is always compensated for upon product sales.
experience: CTO Rejuve, PhD, made Rejuve NFT tokenomics, thirty years of applying AI to social incentives, invented intelligent agent social simulation.
